# Lintech Web Solutions - Website Context for LLMs

## About
Lintech Web Solutions is a premium web design and development agency based in Nairobi, Kenya. We specialize in building high-performance, visually stunning websites for businesses of all sizes.

## Core Services
- Website Development: Custom enterprise-grade web applications using Next.js and React.
- SEO Optimization: Advanced technical and on-page SEO to rank on Google Page 1.
- Responsive Design: Mobile-first, cross-browser compatible interfaces.
- Website Maintenance: Security updates, backups, and 24/7 monitoring.
- Custom Web Solutions: bespoke CRM, e-commerce, and business platforms.
- Payment Integration: Seamless M-Pesa and Stripe integration.

## Contact Information
- Website: https://lintechwebsolutions.co.ke
- Location: Nairobi, Kenya
- Price Range: Ksh 20,000 - 70,000
- Tagline: Design × Development × Results

## Navigation Structure
- / : Home page with all services and portfolio
- /#about : Company overview
- /#services : Detailed service offerings
- /#portfolio : Case studies and past work
- /#contact : Contact form and details
